“May the Celestials guide you in your travels, child.” The fortune teller bids. “Good luck in the lands below.”

“Thanks.” You wave the NPC off. Your vision is a bit blurry as you and Tatsumaki head out of the tent and into clearer air.

“Mm?” There’s a pause before Tatsumaki looks up to you expectantly. The two of you begin down the street toward the heart of Averron.

> Liza, Vyx, Tatsumaki, Ayla, and Sulya are online.
> Vision, Donnel, Nel, Smith, and Aelriss are offline.

> Head to the tavern.
> Head to the Celestial Altar.
> Message someone.
> Other.
